name: CodingGapTaskReason
title: Coding Gap Task Reason CodeSystem
description: Risk adjustment clinical evaluation evidence task reason

concept.definition: Task reason is to provide clinical evaluation evidence to close a risk adjustment coding gap.

concept.display: Invalidate coding gap, patient never had the condition
concept.definition: Task reason is to provide clinical evaluation evidence to invalidate the coding gap that was inaccurate because the patient has never had this condition or is not currently diagnosed with this condition.

concept.display: Invalidate coding gap, condition no longer active
concept.definition: Task reason is to provide clinical evaluation evidence to invalidate the coding gap because the patient was correctly diagnosed but the condition is no longer active.
Task reason is provide clinical evaluation evidence to create and close a net-new risk adjustment coding gap discovered during medical review.
